verses.verse: בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> shall punish יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּחַרְב֨וֹ <S%H2719><s%> sword הַקָּשָׁ֜ה <S%H7186><s%> with his sore וְהַגְּדוֹלָ֣ה <S%H1419><s%> and great וְהַֽחֲזָקָ֗ה <S%H2389><s%> and strong עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> Even לִוְיָתָן֙ <S%H3882><s%> leviathan נָחָ֣שׁ <S%H5175><s%> serpent בָּרִ֔חַ <S%H1281><s%> the piercing וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> Even לִוְיָתָ֔ן <S%H3882><s%> even leviathan נָחָ֖שׁ <S%H5175><s%> serpent עֲקַלָּת֑וֹן <S%H6129><s%> that crooked וְהָרַ֥ג <S%H2026><s%> and he shall slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתַּנִּ֖ין <S%H8577><s%> the dragon אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בַּיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> that [is] in the sea ס
בַּיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כֶּ֥רֶם <S%H3754><s%> ye unto her A vineyard חֶ֖מֶד <S%H2531><s%> desirable עַנּוּ־ <S%H6030><s%> testify לָֽהּ׃

אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD נֹֽצְרָ֔הּ <S%H5341><s%> do keep לִרְגָעִ֖ים <S%H7281><s%> it every moment אַשְׁקֶ֑נָּה <S%H8248><s%> it I will water פֶּ֚ן <S%H6435><s%> one יִפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> lest [any] hurt עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and לַ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> it night וָי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and day אֶצֳּרֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H5341><s%> it I will keep

חֵמָ֖ה <S%H2534><s%> Fury אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> have לִ֑י מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> someone יִתְּנֵ֜נִי <S%H5414><s%> [is] not in me who would set שָׁמִ֥יר <S%H8068><s%> the briers שַׁ֙יִת֙ <S%H7898><s%> [and] thorns בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> battle אֶפְשְׂעָ֥ה <S%H6585><s%> step בָ֖הּ אֲצִיתֶ֥נָּה <S%H6702><s%> through them I would burn יָּֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> them together

א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> Or יַחֲזֵ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> Or let him take hold בְּמָעוּזִּ֔י <S%H4581><s%> of my strength יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> [that] he may make שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace לִ֑י שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace יַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> with me [and] he shall make לִּֽי׃

הַבָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> He shall cause them that come יַשְׁרֵ֣שׁ <S%H8327><s%> to take root יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob יָצִ֥יץ <S%H6692><s%> shall blossom וּפָרַ֖ח <S%H6524><s%> and bud יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וּמָלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> and fill פְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> the face תֵבֵ֖ל <S%H8398><s%> of the world תְּנוּבָֽה׃ <S%H8570><s%> with fruit ס

הַכְּמַכַּ֥ת <S%H4347><s%> him as he smote מַכֵּ֖הוּ <S%H5221><s%> Hath he smitten הִכָּ֑הוּ <S%H5221><s%> those that smote אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Or כְּהֶ֥רֶג <S%H2027><s%> according to the slaughter הֲרֻגָ֖יו <S%H2026><s%> him? [or] is he slain הֹרָֽג׃ <S%H2026><s%> of them that are slain

בְּסַאסְּאָ֖ה <S%H5432><s%> In measure בְּשַׁלְחָ֣הּ <S%H7971><s%> when it shooteth forth תְּרִיבֶ֑נָּה <S%H7378><s%> thou wilt debate הָגָ֛ה <S%H1898><s%> with it he stayeth בְּרוּח֥וֹ <S%H7307><s%> wind הַקָּשָׁ֖ה <S%H7186><s%> his rough בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day קָדִֽים׃ <S%H6921><s%> of the east wind

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore בְּזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> By this יְכֻפַּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> be purged עֲוֹֽן־ <S%H5771><s%> therefore shall the iniquity יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וְזֶ֕ה <S%H2088><s%> and this כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> will be the full פְּרִ֖י <S%H6529><s%> and this [is] all the fruit הָסִ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> to take away חַטָּאת֑וֹ <S%H2403><s%> his sin בְּשׂוּמ֣וֹ ׀ <S%H7760><s%> when he maketh כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> all the stones מִזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar כְּאַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> stones גִר֙ <S%H1615><s%> as chalkstones מְנֻפָּצ֔וֹת <S%H5310><s%> that are beaten in sunder לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יָקֻ֥מוּ <S%H6965><s%> shall not stand up אֲשֵׁרִ֖ים <S%H842><s%> the groves וְחַמָּנִֽים׃ <S%H2553><s%> and images

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> city בְּצוּרָה֙ <S%H1219><s%> Yet the defenced בָּדָ֔ד <S%H910><s%> [shall be] desolate נָוֶ֕ה <S%H5116><s%> [and] the habitation מְשֻׁלָּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> forsaken וְנֶעֱזָ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> and left כַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> like a wilderness שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> There יִרְעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> feed עֵ֛גֶל <S%H5695><s%> there shall the calf וְשָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> and there יִרְבָּ֖ץ <S%H7257><s%> and there shall he lie down וְכִלָּ֥ה <S%H3615><s%> and consume סְעִפֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5585><s%> the branches

בִּיבֹ֤שׁ <S%H3001><s%> thereof are withered קְצִירָהּ֙ <S%H7105><s%> When the boughs תִּשָּׁבַ֔רְנָה <S%H7665><s%> they shall be broken off נָשִׁ֕ים <S%H802><s%> the women בָּא֖וֹת <S%H935><s%> come מְאִיר֣וֹת <S%H215><s%> [and] set them on fire אוֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> are not עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> for it [is] a people בִּינוֹת֙ <S%H998><s%> of no understanding ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יְרַחֲמֶ֣נּוּ <S%H7355><s%> them will not have mercy עֹשֵׂ֔הוּ <S%H6213><s%> therefore he that made וְיֹצְר֖וֹ <S%H3335><s%> on them and he that formed לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יְחֻנֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H2603><s%> them will shew them no favour ס

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יַחְבֹּ֧ט <S%H2251><s%> shall beat off יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> God מִשִּׁבֹּ֥לֶת <S%H7641><s%> from the channel הַנָּהָ֖ר <S%H5104><s%> of the river עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the stream מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְאַתֶּ֧ם <S%H859><s%> and you תְּלֻקְּט֛וּ <S%H3950><s%> and ye shall be gathered לְאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> one אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> by one בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> O ye children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִתָּקַע֮ <S%H8628><s%> shall be blown בְּשׁוֹפָ֣ר <S%H7782><s%> trumpet גָּדוֹל֒ <S%H1419><s%> [that] the great וּבָ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they shall come הָאֹֽבְדִים֙ <S%H6><s%> which were ready to perish בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וְהַנִּדָּחִ֖ים <S%H5080><s%> and the outcasts בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְהִשְׁתַּחֲו֧וּ <S%H7812><s%> and shall worship לַיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> mount הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem
